item.description:
Come out and have some delicious Korean food then...
http://www.koreanabos...


Parking: 73-75 Prospect street. Public parking is available on Prospect street which is 2 blocks south of Koreana.(less than 3 minutes by walk)
Public parking hours: Mon-Fri after 5pm. Sat, Sun, and Holiday all day.
For more information, call 617-576-8661.



...afterwards we can go bowling at Boston Bowl at 2:30 pm to work off the calories!
http://www.bostonbowl...

DIRECTIONS
Traveling on Interstate 93 South
Take exit #12
Follow the signs for Morrissey Blvd.
Boston Bowl is 1/2 mile up on the right.

Traveling on Interstate 93 North
Take exit #13
At the bottom of the ramp go left.
Take your next left onto the service road.
Continue straight, Boston Bowl is 1/4 mile up on the left.
Public Transportation
Take the "T" Red Line to the JFK/UMass stop.

Look for the Phillips Family Courtesy Shuttle (by the ATM Machine) or call (617)287-9100 for the next scheduled pickup time.

The normal shuttle pickups at JFK/UMass are from 7:15 AM - 11:15 PM every 1/2 hour.

For pickup during other times please call (617)287-9100

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Koreana and Bowling
